original_text: And he built altars in the house of the Lord, of which the Lord had said, “In Jerusalem will I put my name.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 전에 이르시기를 내가 내 이름을 예루살렘에 두리라 하신 여호와의 성전에 제단들을 쌓고

sentences.original_text: And he built altars in the house of the Lord,
of which the Lord had said,
“In Jerusalem will I put my name.”
